interface.name: EAP_MemoDocumentData
interface.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"( label: "M E M O R A N D U M", contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"( columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Fund Name", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", value: ri!memoDocumentData.fundName, saveInto: ri!memoDocumentData.fundName, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "To", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", value: ri!memoDocumentData.to, saveInto: ri!memoDocumentData.to, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "From", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", value: ri!memoDocumentData.from, saveInto: ri!memoDocumentData.from, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "CC", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", value: ri!memoDocumentData.cc, saveInto: ri!memoDocumentData.cc, readOnly: true ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fileUploadField_v1"( label: "Upload Memo", helpTooltip: "Upload a pdf document which needs to first and second page of actual memo", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", maxSelections: 1, target: #"_a-0000ec4d-50ec-8000-9bf5-011c48011c48_312636", value: ri!userUploadedMemo, saveInto: ri!userUploadedMemo, placeholder: "--Upload a memo--", validations: { if( fv!files.extension = "pdf", {}, "The document should be of file type PDF" ) }, showWhen: #"_a-0000ed19-51a4-8000-9c01-011c48011c48_356326" ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Memo Date", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", value: ri!memoDocumentData.date, saveInto: ri!memoDocumentData.date ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Subject", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", value: ri!memoDocumentData.subject, saveInto: ri!memoDocumentData.subject ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Quarter End Date", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", value: ri!memoDocumentData.quarterEndDate, saveInto: ri!memoDocumentData.quarterEndDate ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Wire Transfer Date", labelPosition: "JUSTIFIED", value: ri!memoDocumentData.wireTransferDate, saveInto: ri!memoDocumentData.wireTransferDate ) } ) } ) }, buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"( primaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"( label: "Submit", submit: true, style: "SOLID", loadingIndicator: true ) }, secondaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"( label: "Cancel", value: true, saveInto: ri!cancel, submit: true, style: "OUTLINE", validate: false ) } ) )
